title: Provide First Responders with Building Entry Codes
description: Firefighters responding to an alarm at a commercial building need the entry codes to get inside.

tasks.description: Receive a request for access codes from a fire captain at the scene of an alarm.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent acknowledges the request from the first responder.

tasks.description: Look up the building address in the secure 'Knox Box' database.
Securely transmit the building's door and elevator access codes to the fire captain's authenticated device.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the critical access information securely.
